subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manager Buck Showalter’s Orioles advanced in the playoffs by defeating the Texas Rangers, who fired him in 2006. Next up is the Yankees, whom he guided to the postseason in 1995.
snippet: Manager Buck Showalter’s Orioles advanced in the playoffs by defeating the Texas Rangers, who fired him in 2006. Next up is the Yankees, whom he guided to the postseason in 1995.
